question: Asia’s largest certified tier IV Data centre has been inaugurated in which Indian state?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Maharashtra Uddhav Thackeray has virtually inaugurated the Asia’s largest certified tier IV data centre, near Mumbai.
The Yotta NM1 data centre building is the largest tier IV Data centre in India. It is also claimed to be the second largest in the world. The private data centre is expected to serve the engineering and real estate businesses and boost investments in the state.
